title: Is This New Luggage Scale Effective? Expert Traveler Accessories Customers Share Their Experiences
text:
July 15, 2015 - San Francisco, CA -- Seasoned travelers or business people who travel regularly have had to become experts when packing their luggage, particularly for extended journeys. They know that airlines have very strict guidelines as to the weight and dimensions of cases and bags that can be carried on board. Most homes do not have any means by which travelers can calculate the weight of their luggage and this can lead to a significant amount of guesswork.
With the release of the new Electronic Luggage Scale from Expert Traveler Accessories, travelers are able to easily and accurately weigh their bags with a pocketsize, digital scale that will measure up to 110lbs ( 50kg) in weight. As soon as bags exceed 20kg the Green LCD display turns red to indicate the bags are overloaded.
"The feedback from customers has been extremely satisfying", said Rose Ilton, company spokesperson.
Tony C said, "I loved the Spirit level inbuilt into this scale. It's a great addition. You can make sure that you are holding the device correctly, so that you can get an accurate reading."
According to Robyn Van der Kley, "Such a product is a God send, we traveled on many different airlines, recently, each had their own Excess Luggage restrictions, this scale was so handy- it saved us so much hassle and stress."
CJ Miller also gave a review regarding the Luggage Scale and said, "I wasnt sure how precise this would be and so I tested it against some other scales. Really surprising results - Spot On every time.Very happy to recommend to other travelers."
With such reviews coming from customers who have already used this product, people can already determine how effective and convenient this product is. Expert Traveler Accessories expects that more and more travelers will include this very helpful device into their personal Travel kit .
